Title: Loose Lips
Plot: Alan help a department store Santa sue to get his job back after he is terminated for being a transvestite. Brad bets Alan that he won't win. A therapist seeks Lori's help when one of his patients fantasizes about killing his ex-wife.
GuestStars: Al Sharpton,  Debbie Lee Carrington,  Jim O'Heir,  Vicki Davis,  Cheryl White,  H. Richard Greene,  Wayne Wilderson,  Neal Matarazzo,  George Newbern,  Steven M. Gagnon,  Donna Cooper,  Heidi Heller
